sentences.sContent: The local paper featured me standing on a stepladder with a caption, "Wendy climbs the ladder to success."
sentences.sCn: 当地的报纸刊登了一幅我站在活梯上的特写，下面写着：“温迪登上了成功之梯。”

synos.tran: [语][计][图情]标题；字幕；说明；逮捕

trans.tranCn: 报纸文章的标题；照片说明
trans.tranOther: A caption is the words printed underneath a picture or cartoon which explain what it is about
